translations.source: 磁选机安装：与输送机中心线对齐，安装高度符合设计要求，固定牢固。
translations.target: Magnetic separator installation: Align with the conveyor centerline; ensure the installation elevation meets the design requirements; fasten securely.

translations.source: 皮带秤安装：安装在输送带张力恒定位置，远离凸凹曲线段，水平度偏差≤0.1mm/m，传感器安装牢固，信号传输正常。
translations.target: Belt scale installation: Install on the belt conveyor at a location with constant belt tension, away from convex/concave curved sections; levelness deviation ≤ 0.1 mm/m; mount sensors securely; ensure normal signal transmission.
